title: (x) Palahniuk's Pygmy Book Cover Font? - custom by Rodrigo Corral Design {John L}
content:
Can anyone identify this? I've tried everything...thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202031326im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PYGMY-1_5688.jpg)
author: KMH

comments.content: I was impressed with that cover, too. I wrote to Rodrigo Corral Design and received a very pleasant response from Rachel Bergman, the studio manager. She says, "That type was created in our studio, custom for Pygmy."
